programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: During the summer of 1957, ex-racecar driver Enzo Ferrari is in crisis. Bankruptcy stalks the company he and his wife, Laura, built from nothing a decade earlier. Their tempestuous marriage struggles with the mourning for one son and the acknowledgement of another. Attempting to secure their survival, he rolls the dice on one race - 1,000 miles across Italy, the iconic Mille Miglia. Director Michael Mann's drama, starring Adam Driver and Jack O'Connell Michael Mann - Director, Michael Mann - Director Adam Driver - Enzo Ferrari Penélope Cruz - Laura Ferrari Shailene Woodley - Lina Lardi Sarah Gadon - Linda Christian Gabriel Leone - Alfonso de Portago Jack O'Connell - Peter Collins Patrick Dempsey - Piero Taruffi Adam Driver - Enzo Ferrari Penélope Cruz - Laura Ferrari Shailene Woodley - Lina Lardi Sarah Gadon - Linda Christian Gabriel Leone - Alfonso de Portago Jack O'Connell - Peter Collins Patrick Dempsey - Piero Taruffi.

programme.title: Promising Young Woman

programme.title: Dinner for Schmucks
programme.desc: Comedy starring Steve Carell and Paul Rudd. Ambitious executive Tim Conrad is keen to be promoted at his company. So when he hears about a monthly event that his boss holds at his mansion, in which guests are invited to bring along an oddball to be ridiculed, Tim is determined to go along. programme.title: 57 Seconds
programme.desc: Franklin, a blogger, scuppers an attack against tech guru Anton Burrell, and finds a ring that the pioneering genius dropped. programme.title: Suicide Squad

programme.title: The Unlikely Pilgrimage of Harold Fry

programme.desc: Former Royal Navy officer Bernie Jordan is happily settled with wife Rene at a care home. programme.title: The Exorcist: Believer
programme.desc: Single parent Victor Fielding raises his daughter Angela, 13 years after the death of his pregnant wife in a Haitian earthquake. A shocking chain of events convinces Victor that his daughter's soul is at stake and he calls upon Chris MacNeil to help him confront an ancient evil. programme.desc: Fran is an office worker who lives in a world of her own on the dreary Oregon coast. programme.title: Dungeons & Dragons: Honour Among Thieves
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Comedy, Sci Fi ║ 2023 ║ 12A
programme.desc: Following the death of his wife, lute-playing bard Edgin abandons a noble pledge and turns to petty thievery with his surrogate sister, exiled barbarian Holga. The duo recruit self-doubting sorcerer Simon and incorrigible rogue Forge to their merry gang. A plan to steal the fabled Scroll of Reawakening backfires and Edgin is incarcerated with Holga on charges of grand larceny and skulduggery. programme.title: Bros
programme.desc: Podcaster Bobby Lieber embraces his role as curator of the first National LGBTQ+ History Museum in America. Despite obvious differences, the men awkwardly navigate a no-strings relationship. programme.title: The Exorcist: Believer
programme.desc: Single parent Victor Fielding raises his daughter Angela, 13 years after the death of his pregnant wife in a Haitian earthquake. He is alarmed when Angela and her friend Katherine vanish in the woods and return three days later with no memory of their ordeal. A shocking chain of events convinces Victor that his daughter's soul is at stake and he calls upon Chris MacNeil to help him confront an ancient evil. programme.title: The Exorcist: Believer
programme.desc: Single parent Victor Fielding raises his daughter Angela, 13 years after the death of his pregnant wife in a Haitian earthquake. He is alarmed when Angela and her friend Katherine vanish in the woods and return three days later with no memory of their ordeal. A shocking chain of events convinces Victor that his daughter's soul is at stake and he calls upon Chris MacNeil to help him confront an ancient evil. programme.title: OT1000 United Premier League Goals
programme.desc: 92/93 & 93/94. We go back to the start of the first two seasons of the Premier League and take a look at the first 78 goals scored as United recorded back-to-back league titles.

programme.title: OT1000 United Premier League Goals
programme.desc: 94/95 & 95/96. Volume 2 takes us from goal 79 to goal 156, including the record 9-0 win over Ipswich and United's fastest ever Premier League goal, scored by Ryan Giggs against Southampton.

programme.title: OT1000 United Premier League Goals
programme.desc: 96/97 & 97/98. Volume 3 takes us from goal 157 to goal 236, including Eric Cantona's famous chip against Sunderland and another league title for the Reds.

programme.title: OT1000 United Premier League Goals
programme.desc: 98/99 & 99/00. Volume 4 takes us from goal 237 to goal 340. The Reds recorded a historic Treble and then went goal crazy, hitting 59 to win the league in 1999/2000.

programme.title: UTD Podcast - Mike Phelan
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast with Mike Phelan, filmed in front of a live studio audience in Malta.

programme.title: OT1000 United Premier League Goals
programme.desc: 00/01 & 01/02. Volume 5 takes us from goal 341 to goal 429, including six of the best in one memorable afternoon against Arsenal.

programme.title: OT1000 United Premier League Goals
programme.desc: 02/03 & 03/04. Volume 6 takes us from goal 430 to goal 508. The Reds' faithful were treated to the finishing prowess of Ruud van Nistelrooy, who scored three hat-tricks in the 02/03 campaign.

programme.title: OT1000 United Premier League Goals
programme.desc: 04/05 & 05/06. Volume 7 takes us from goal 509 to goal 576, including Wayne Rooney's majestic volley against Newcastle as he announced himself as the next United superstar.

programme.title: OT1000 United Premier League Goals
programme.desc: 06/07 & 07/08. Volume 8 takes us from goal 577 to goal 669, as the Reds reclaimed their Premier League crown and Cristiano Ronaldo scored goal after goal, including 21 in a single season.

programme.title: UTD Podcast: Youth Voice with Wes Brow
programme.desc: Watch our latest UTD Podcast. Wes Brown is joined by Manchester United Foundation's 'Youth Voice' group to talk about issues important to them.

programme.title: OT1000 United Premier League Goals
programme.desc: 08/09 & 09/10. Volume 9 goes from goal 670 to goal 764, including Federico Macheda's debut strike, a four-goal haul for Wayne Rooney against Hull and a dream derby winner from Michael Owen.

programme.title: OT1000 United Premier League Goals
programme.desc: 10/11 & 11/12. Volume 10 takes us from goal 765 to goal 865, including a memorable derby goal from Wayne Rooney and a remarkable afternoon against Arsenal, as the Reds hit eight.

programme.title: OT1000 United Premier League Goals
programme.desc: 12/13 & 13/14. Volume 11 takes us from goal 866 to goal 939. Robin van Persie's goals helped the Reds to league title number 20 as Sir Alex Ferguson bowed out in style.

programme.title: OT1000 United Premier League Goals
programme.desc: 14/15 & 15/16. Volume 12 takes us over the finish line, starting with goal 940. The final 60 strikes include memorable debuts for Anthony Martial and Marcus Rashford.

programme.desc: Bruno talks all things Manchester and his love for his adopted city in this exclusive interview with our midfield maestro.
